1Atotalof24Eleliveswearingspor: 1. A total of 24 Elelives wearing sportswear with their own names are sent to join the Elelive Family Games. The sportswear is divided into 4 colors.
2TheGamesWillEndEvery5MinutesA: 2. The Games will end every 5 minutes and an "Athlete" will be born. Before the end of each round of games, Elelive can be sent to participate by giving the VJs designated gifts to get tickets for the Games. When your lucky Elelive returns as an athlete, you will receive generous lucky bag. The more gifts you give, the bigger the reward will be!
3ThereAre4TypesOfItemsOfTheGam: 3. There are 4 types of items of the games: the name of the Elelive athlete, the initials of the name, the color of the sportswear, and the gender of the players. Multiple entries can be selected for each round.
4UsersWhoUse≥300TicketsAtOneTi: 4. Users who use ≥300 tickets at one time and win the competition will receive an additional exclusive avatar frame valid for 3 days {value}
5SendTheDesignatedGiftsOfTheGa: 5. Send the designated gifts of the Games, and the VJ of the live broadcast room can get a certain percentage of sports rewards.
6VJsWhoDontWinWillAlsoGetLucky: 7. VJs who don't win will also get lucky bag {value}. Don't lose heart, and keep trying!
7DisclaimerThisGameIsToEnhance: 8. Disclaimer: This game is to enhance the user's viewing experience in the live broadcast room, and is only for entertainment and communication. Not affiliated with Apple Inc.
StayGame: Stay tuned for the result of the game...
resultOfThis: The result of this round will be announced soon, plz participate in the next round later!
